commit.message:
Merge pull request #122 from cassiersg/fix-mod

Reformat modules in external files

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,3 @@
+// Some nested mods
+
+mod nestedmod;

@@ -0,0 +1,4 @@
+// This is an empty file containing only
+// comments
+
+// ...................

@@ -0,0 +1,3 @@
+// A standard mod
+
+fn a(   )     {}

@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@
+// Yet Another mod
+// Nested
+
+use c::a;
+
+fn foo(    ) {    }

@@ -0,0 +1,3 @@
+// Some nested mods
+
+mod nestedmod;

@@ -0,0 +1,4 @@
+// This is an empty file containing only
+// comments
+
+// ...................
